text: [Music starts]
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a ghost. I’m a little ghost.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a ghost. I’m a little ghost.

[Everyone makes ghost noises]
ooooooooh...
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a cowboy. I’m a little cowboy.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a cowboy. I’m a little cowboy.

[Cowboy movie style music plays]
Everyone get on your horse! Yee-hah!
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a witch. I’m a little witch.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a witch. I’m a little witch.

[Witches cackle and spooky music plays.
Everyone flies around the room on a broom.]
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a monster. I’m a little monster.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a monster. I’m a little monster.

[Slow, spooky music plays. Everyone moves 
around the room like Frankenstein’s monster.]
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a ballerina. A little ballerina.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a ballerina. A little ballerina.

Okay, tippy toes everybody.
[Classical style ballet music starts]
Here we go!
Okay, next one, last one, pirate!
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a pirate. I’m a little pirate.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Who are you?
♪ I’m a pirate. I’m a little pirate.
[Pirate movie style music plays.]
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Happy Halloween! Happy Halloween.
♪ Knock knock. Trick or treat? Happy Halloween! Happy Halloween.
